TEXT.S:
Republic of the Congo (/)
u Republic of the Congo (/) sa i labu nu Feico, itiza i 1 00 S, 15 00 E u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa 342,000 km2, u ahebal nu lala'ay sa 341,500 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa 500 km2hamin nu tademaw sa 4,852,412. kakalukan umah sa 31.10%, kilakilangan umah sa 65.60%, zumaay henay umah sa 3.30%
tapang tusu nu kanatalu tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Brazzaville.
kakininan nu kanatal demiadkakining nu kanatal demiad sa 15 bulad 8 demiad.
tabakiay a tapang nu kanatalu tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Denis Sassou Nguesso, micakat a demiad sa i 1997 a mihca 10 bulad 25 demiad. u cunli nu Congo kapulungan a kanatalayza sa ci Anatole Collinet Makosso, micakat a demiad sa i 2021 a mihcaan 5 bulad 12 demiad. Democratic Republic of the Congo, France (Fa-kuw ) a kamu, République démocratique du Congo, miwada tu nisulitan,"RDC",i tini i Africa (Fey-zhou ) i tepan nu kanatal, u kamu tu Min-cu-kang-kowDR Congohan, Congo('kim)Congo-Kinshasahan, tukus nu lala' kaahebal pakala tu 234.5 a mang km2, sakatusa tabakiay uynu dada' i Algeria (A-rl-ci-li-ya ) atu kitakit tu saka sabaw cacay a tabakiay a kanatal, u tademaw malabas tu 8,700 a mangaan i kitakit a tademaw saka sabaw enem ka katuud, Africa (Fey-zhou ) a tademaw saka sepat nu katuuday a kanatal, satusa i kitakiday a tademaw saktuuday nu Fa-yu-kow-ciaa kamu nu kanatal, kahenulan a tuse u Kinshasa (Cin-sia-sa ). (u kamu nu Hulam sa: Democratic Republic of the Congo:République démocratique du CongoRDC(DR Congo)Congo-Kinshasa[ 1]234.52118700[6]164) nu binawlanay a nisakaku Kang-kow-ze-yu-bangkakuniza a sakaput atu By-su-kang-kow, 1960 a mihcaan enem a bulad tulu bataan a demiad misakaku patizeng tu kanatal, uyni patizeng tu kanatal hasa, atu belaw i saayaway misateket tu uyzaanay u Francetungusay nu malecaday tu Congo kapulungan a kanatal, mala u macu' tu nu kanatal a syakay, i tusaay a kanatal a ni pangangan hawsa, pasu kahenulan a tuse, u ngangan pala u kasazuma , namahini a singangan aca tu Congo kapulungan a kanatalLeopoldville (Li-aw-bo-de-wey-lr ), Congo 'kim(Congo-Kinshasa)han ku ngangan, 1964 a mihcaan pitu a bulad cacay a demiad, pasumat tu ngangan nu kanatal Democratic Republic of the Congohan tu, 1971 a mihcaan cacay bataan a bulad tusa bataan izaw ku pitu a demiad i kala cung-tungan ni Men-bo-tuou tayzaay micumut a tademaw pasumat han ku ngangan nu kanatal Sa-yi(:Zaïre) han, 1997 a mihcaan lima a bulad sabaw pitu a demiad ci Luo-lang-ka-pi-la(·) amikeliday tu Cang-kow-cya-fang-min-cu-li-lang-tung-mengmicumut mingayaw tu Kinshasa (Cin-sia-sa ) pabaelin tu ni kuwanan Men-bo-tuo, mahiza a panukas tu ngangan nu kanatal Democratic Republic of the Congokatukuh ayza. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 1960630""[ 2]196481[8]19711027:Zaïre1997517·) 1998 a mihcaan malinga'tu tu sakatusa a ngangayaw nu Congo, uynian a kanatal mapelpel tuway, zayhan uynian a ngangayaw macalap ku siwaay nu Africa (Fey-zhou ) a kanatal pakala' tu 20 ku sibakudangay nu icelang, namahini pangangan han tu "Africa (Fey-zhou ) a ngangayaw i kitakit u kitakitay" a nu mahini i 2003 a mihcaan masasulit tu sakakapah a letek, nika winikalalebu, mahini tu malalid tunian a kanatal i nuwalian a kakitizaan, mipacici' mipenec mikacaw tu tatayna atu zumaay tu kakaydihan nu uzip u kapelpel kahizaan i kitakit u sa talakaway, uynian a ngangayaw, namakay 1998 a mihcaan mapatay ku tademaw tu 540 a mang. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 1998920""20031998540)
laylay ayza nipangangan tu Kang-kow-kung-he-kow""a kakitizaan, ayaw nu waluay a mang a mihcaan izaw tu tademaw nu muengay, i saayaw nu kasumamadan a laylay malingatu tu ku CongoBantu a tademawmabulawamin uheni i ayaw nu kasumamadan tu 2000 a mihcaan katukuh ayaw nu kasumamadan tu 500 a mihcaan namakay saetipan nuwamisan mabulaw tayza i masahelingay a kakitizaan, uyniantu a mihcaan pasu nu ayaway mabulaway a mihcaan, katukuh tu pabelin tu micunuday a tademaw, Bantu a tademawmabilaw mikitay tu i tizaay nuenengay nu By-ke-mi-zenbinacadan a tademaw, kuheni u lalangawan papulung pacumut tu ayzaay a Congonu timulan a kakitizaan, Bantu a tademawnamakay satipan nutipan a Africaa kakitizaan nu Africa, minanam tuway tu sakalu atu numukingnay a sadiket atu mikawaw, nu CongoBantua kamu ku angangan a kamu. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 82000500)
lala' nu hekal Min-cu-kang-koi tepanay nu kanatal satipan nu Africa (Fey-zhou ), teleklalmibaladay nu tepan a nuwamisan, nuwalian matatules tu U-kang-da, Luanda (Lu-an-da ),Pu-long-di,Tan-san-niy-ya, nuamisan nu belaw Nan-su-dan, Cung-fay-cong-he-cow, nusatipan a kenis tuKang-kow-kung-he-kow, nutimulan a kenis u An-ke-la,San-piy-yaKang-ko-hea sauwac, namakay nuwalian pasayza satipan malikit i mahamin nu kanatal, nuzuma izaw ku U-pan-cia sauwac, Lu-a-la-paa sauwac u kahenulan nu likit nu sauwac, nuwalian a lilis nu kenis namakay amis pasayza i nutimulan izaw ku Ay-bu-tea taku,Ay-de-huaa taku,Ci-ua taku,Tan-kan-i-kea taku atu Mu-uay-lua takuan. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: )
liwliw a kakitizaan Democratic Republic of the Congoa kakitizaan i teban nu Africa (Fey-zhou ) nu kanatal , i tiza i Africa (Fey-zhou ) balicu' nu teleklalan a kakitizaan, tabaki ku lala', tabaki ku lala' aazihan tu aatupan, Africa (Fey-zhou ) uyni dada' A-el-ci-li-yau sakatusa tabakiay a kanatal, mahamin a kanatal pulung nu hekal a lala' 2 344,858 Ping-bang-kung-li( _) nuwamisan a balaw u Cung-bey-kung-he-ko, nuwalian nuamisan atu Nan-su-danmatatules ku lala', nuwalian a balaw u Dung-bey-kung-he-kowmasaapilis ku ilabu ku diheb, talulung ku nanaum salungan azihen atu U-kan-daTan-san-ni-yaLuanda (Lu-an-da ) atu pulung-dimatatulas, nutimulan atu An-ke-lamatatules mababelaw nuwalian nutimulan San-pi-ya, satipan kenis nu Kang-ko, satipan nutimulan i salikit a sauwac Kang-ko-he, i salikit kalimucu' Ta-si-yang, dadipsan 37 Kung-likatanayu' dada'. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 22344858[20]37)
cen-ce 2001 a mihcaan cacay a bulad sabaw pitu a demiad, Lo-lang-de-si-lay-ka-pi-la(-·) mapatasasa nu saba a sakakaay nu hitay mapacuk mapatay tu ci La-sen-di-mi-ze-le(·)Rashidi Mizele, u wawa nu Ye-se-fu-ka-la-pi(·) taluma i kanatal mala Cung-tung, mikawaw katukuh i 2019 a mihcaan 1 a bulad 24 a demiad. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 2001118-··Rashidi Mizele·2019124) 2006 a mihcan 7 abulad 30 a demiad, Congo 'kimmikawaw ku Kung-tungatu Ko-mi-iy-huayamisingkiw, 8 a bulad 20 a demiad, misaketeday misingkiw ku Uay-yuan-huaysakamusa,pasingkiwan tu Kung-tungnayay ku pakaalaay tu 50% kaipapaw a paya, ci Ye-se-fu-ca-pi-la(·) atu Zang-pi-i-rlben-pa(-·) misingkiw aca tu sakatusa apisingkiw 10 a bulad 29 a deniad, sakatusa makakutay misingkiw tu a a Kung-tung11 a bulad 15 a demiad, misatekeday misingkiway a uay-uangsakamusa, ci Ka-pi-rlku masingkiway a Kung-tung,12 a bulad 30 a demiad, ci An-tuo-ban-ci-can-cia( ·) mala u Cung-li. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 2006730[23]82050%·-·[24]1029[25]11151230·)
cin-ci makay 1980 a mihcaan a tepan nu ciday hausa, Congoa nulaculan mawada tu, kanahatu i 1960 namisateket tulin i Nan-beyhausa Africa (Fey-zhou ) a sakatusa ku kikay kusi nu kanatal, nika satabaki satu uyni kasakalamkam a malahat u mikimmay atu miba'tuay atu malukay u niu kange'luan kaizaw, saayaway atu sakatusa pingangayaw nu Congoatu1996 mmalinga'tu tu macacukah, tabaki satu kini sakalawacu' nu Congoa tademaw nu kanatal nisangaan a aca atu caysan nu kanatal nu micumuday, a pabelinen ku suku nu kanatal micunus tu ku talakaw, tu ku nu nutawan a kinapinanay tu a ngangayaw, mapatay tu 500 a man kakatuud nu mapatayay a tademaw, malilit tu a makunga'layatu imelang uynian a kanatal, pakala tu tulua tusa ku tademaw caay ka kapah ku uzip. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 19801960""1996[34]500)
malukay u malukay a kanatal, malahad tu nikalukan, u lalabu nu kanatal masenged sidamek tu lala' mahini u nikalukan atuud yadah satu, hatu i kakuti'ay paluma', u ngannganan nu nipalumaan u a zung-gu-sua kilang, misangatu zung-gua simal u kahenulan kuni , uyza satu nipalunaan nu kuhike-kesanasay,kupa,papah nu katasaku,tipus,lami', padingad, kubkub, tebus, kalitang,galasu, paza'atu uzaamin. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: )
tademaw tutuc tu 2016 a mihcaan pulung nisulitan a tademaw Democratic Republic of the Congoi lalabu nu kanatal pulung izaw ku 254 ku ni kasaniyazu' nu binacadan, Bantua kamu a kamuan musakamuay tuynian a kamu pakala tu pulung 84% ku tademaw, Congoa binacadan, Nen-ciy-la a binacadan, Lu-pa a minacadan, Men-ke-en-ku-en-tu a men-ke-en-du a minacadan(-), Lung-da a binacadan, Su-ku a binacadanamin, u liwan satu u kamu Su-dan a kamuA-can-de a binacadanatu Ni-lu-de a kamuA-lu-rl a binacadanatu Pa ke-mi a banacadanamin, kamu nu kanatal u Fa a kamu, angangan a kamu izaw ku Lin-ciy-la a kamuCi-kang-ku a kamuCi-lu-pa a kamuatu Se-wa-si-li a kamu, u binawlan 55% ku u Tin-si-kiw,35% u baluhay a singku, nu zumaay pulung 10%. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 201625484%-;55%35%10%)
